- All paragraph IDs shifted forward by 5 positions (old start 12.501 â†’ new start 12.506)
- August 17-18: Major renumbering impact cascades through entire range
- All N/A entries (empty files) remain N/A
- Final ID: 12.1667 (previously 12.1662, shift of +5)

- Total paragraph count: 1162 (unchanged)
- Shift amount: +5 across entire range
